    Amy Flower

    Amy

    A song from The Oral Cigarettes released in 2016 under the album "FIXION".

    Lyrics

    Follows line by line from Spotify.
    -----------------------------------

    「今何してる?」
    Ima nani shiteru?
    What are you doing right now?

    「きっと恋してる」
    Kitto koishiteru
    I'm surely in love.

    「こんな思いなんて初めてなの」って
    Konna omoi nante hajimete nano tte
    It's the first time I've had feelings like this.

    本当にわかってくれてたのは
    Hontou ni wakatte kureteta no wa
    The one who truly understood me...

    君のほうだと気付いた
    Kimi no hou da to kidzuita
    I realized it was you.

    -----------------------------------

    知らないうちに
    Shiranai uchi ni
    Without realizing it,

    長い道のりを歩いたね僕ら
    Nagai michi nori wo aruita ne bokura
    We've come a long way together.

    ずっと君のためだって
    Zutto kimi no tame datte
    It was always for you.

    思ってたんだよ
    Omotteta nda yo
    That's what I was thinking.

    -----------------------------------

    諦めてた君との時間に
    Akirameteta kimi to no jikan ni
    The time I had given up on with you...

    手を伸ばせば少しなら届く気がした
    Te wo nobaseba sukoshi nara todoku ki ga shita
    I felt like if I reached out, I might reach it, even just a little.

    もし時を戻せるのなら
    Moshi toki wo modoseru no nara
    If I could turn back time...

    君に一言伝えたい
    Kimi no hitokoto tsutaetai
    I want to say something to you.

    ごめんねありがとう
    Gomen ne arigatou
    I'm sorry... thank you.

    -----------------------------------

    エイミーここで今二人
    Amy koko de ima futari
    Amy, the two of us, here and now...

    肩を寄せ合った日々を
    Kata wo yoseatta hibi wo
    Those days we huddled close...

    思い出すと胸の奥ぎゅっと
    Omoidasu to mune no oku gyutto
    When I remember them, my heart tightens deep inside.

    エイミーここで今二人
    Amy koko de ima futari
    Amy, the two of us, here and now...

    また出会えるってことを
    Mata deaeru tte koto wo
    That we'll meet again...

    信じて待つよ
    Shinjite matsu yo
    I'll keep believing and waiting.

    何があってもずっと
    Nani ga attemo zutto
    No matter what happens, always.

    ねぇ君もそうだろう?
    Nee kimi mo sou darou?
    Hey, you feel the same... don't you?

    -----------------------------------

    季節が過ぎて
    Kisetsu ga sugite
    As the seasons passed...

    僕のことを本当に思うのなら
    Boku no koto wo hontou ni omou no nara
    If you still really care about me...

    今更だって構わない
    Imasara datte kamawanai
    Even if it's too late now, I don't mind.

    小さな手を掴むよ
    Chisana te wo tsukamu yo
    I’ll take your small hand in mine.

    -----------------------------------

    愛しき人よ
    Itoshiki hito yo
    My beloved...

    僕の声は君に届いてますか?
    Boku no koe wa kimi ni todoitematsu ka?
    Can you hear my voice?

    愛する人を守るためにそっと
    Ai suru hito wo mamoru tame ni sotto
    Gently, to protect the one I love.

    -----------------------------------

    エイミーここで今二人
    Amy koko de ima futari
    Amy, the two of us, here and now...

    肩を寄せ合った日々を
    Kata wo yoseatta hibi wo
    Those days we huddled close...

    思い出すと胸の奥ぎゅっと
    Omoidasu to mune no oku gyutto
    When I remember them, my heart tightens deep inside.

    世界中の人々が笑えるように
    Sekaijyuu no hitobito ga waraeru you ni
    So that people around the world can smile...

    この歌を送るよ
    Kono uta wo okuru yo
    I'm sending this song.

    ねぇエイミーいいだろう?
    Nee Amy ii darou?
    Hey, Amy... that's okay, right?
